channel.title: ChronicScape 718 Vorago || Squeal || Drygores || Theiving guild || more
channel.description:
Here at ChronicScape our mission is to be able to provide a rsps that players have the right to give feedback on things they would like to see implemented and we will try our best at giving them the content they would have added.
Website: http://chronicscape718.webs.com/home DL Link: on website webclient: http://chronicscape718.webs.com/webclient Forum: http://chronicscape.site50.net
-- All Races, Nationality, Beliefs, genders and ages welcomed --
Features: -Offhand Weapons and drygores, plus rarely used equipment -Plenty of items to discover -25 Trainable skills and improving them frequently -Fequent updates -Unique teleports -Unique home -Loyalty and Squeal Systems -Stable economy -many bosses and training areas -Donor areas with more coming soon -Working Dung + construction -Friendly Staff -Theiving guild -Diffrent minigames -Turm and overload!!! -Growing Community
AND MUCH MORE! So join today and Come find your Destiny (and maybe smoke something)
Media: [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/i4lo1t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/aln5lg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/10yo3gi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/33acpr7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/vnmbuu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/becz8h.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2vaavpx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/xoljrt.png[/img]

item.title: ChronicScape 718 Vorago || Squeal || Drygores || Theiving guild || more
item.dc:creator: @mogging mogging
item.description:
@mogging wrote:

[quote=“DreadScape, post:24, topic:550030”]Just looks like the same ones downloaded over and over again sad. But hey when you learn java, Let me know we can talk.

and $2,000 thats all you have? Life savings huh? Bet you can’t wait to move out! Sad thing is, Your $2,000 would barely pay my bills Shit. would barely pay just my mortgage bill.[/quote]

I know my java son. And moving out? I’m 30 in April and I haven’t even lived or talked with my mom since I was 18. Nice try trolling there you might want to try harder next time And $2000 is probably all you got yourself seeing as your IP is telling me that you live with YOUR mom so don’t put that on me you little 13 year old.

Read full topic

item.title: ChronicScape 718 Vorago || Squeal || Drygores || Theiving guild || more
item.dc:creator: @xdeon xdeon
item.description:
@xdeon wrote:

why such anger, and in all honesty he is a good owner, he doesn’t talk bad upon others unless spoken to rudely, or being in-coherent about a situation.

[quote=“wimstr, post:9, topic:550030”]Oh look Vorago, Squeal of Fortune, Drygores…

What’s new… :palm:[/quote]

emotes for diffrent items and such added, global item spawns, growing pets, fairy ring system, RS Specials and Custom Specials, fun player punishments, and alot more dont automatically turn down a server because of a advertisement, advertisements are made to grab the attention of the general masses, so i mostly incorporated things people like the most… there’s alot of other content within the server that alot of people may or may not be familiar with and that might not grab their attention as much as it would to more advanced rsps players you know?

Read full topic
item.source: ChronicScape 718 Vorago || Squeal || Drygores || Theiving guild || more

item.title: ChronicScape 718 Vorago || Squeal || Drygores || Theiving guild || more
item.dc:creator: @mogging mogging
item.description:
@mogging wrote:

[quote=“DreadScape, post:19, topic:550030”]Just the Icons from Trisidia X. Lol. So you downloaded TrisidiaX, Changed a few Names. Hit run. [quote author=mogging link=topic=668906.msg4473985#msg4473985 date=1424673202]

are you stupid? i’m talking about the in-game chatbox icons.

Oh well? I am the developer and owner so I decide what crowns are used

To be a good owner, you should listen to your players. Saying that just makes you sound like a terrible owner

And yeah, I agree with Fails; you should change those icons.

Since when the fudge should a regular player care about crown images? The fudge you on? Don’t play then baby girl otherwise make your own damn server.
[/quote] You didn’t make this server. Not hard to click run.[quote author=mogging link=topic=668906.msg4474098#msg4474098 date=1424734066]

Definitely a server I won’t even attempt to play.
An owner like you is an owner I don’t want to deal with.

He stated an opinion on your images. Don’t be an asshole and give a snarky reply.
Tell them that you understand that, while it may not be a style they like, it is what you went with.
You can always ask them to suggest an alternative to the current crown set you’re using.

The reason I don’t like them is because they aren’t consistent. You’ve got 3 different styles of crowns shown in your pictures. You should make them based on a similar concept.

Crowns are by rights noob. And why use new crowns when my players like them? You two are the only people making a huge ordeal out of an image. Not everything has to go your way alright? And I am generally nice just not when some noob wants to say “get rid of your content” basically which to me is rude. He could just have said “looks alright but the crowns are not for me.” But I forgot most of you are still in middle school so it really is no use arguing with someone who’s IQ hasn’t reached above 50 yet. Even a person with down syndrome would understand this.
[/quote]

"When some noob wants to say “get rid of your content” wait you created this source?

All in all, You’re a horrible server owner. Not all players will like…“your content” But don’t flip shit when they don’t.[/quote]

Yes I did create this it really isn’t hard at all to do thats why you won’t find any matrix crap in it beside things I learned to do over the years of working on private servers even more complex than this. And I don’t care if someone doesn’t like it they are entitled to their own opinion but when it makes no sense and you only saw one or two crowns then your assumption is flawed.

Read full topic
item.source: ChronicScape 718 Vorago || Squeal || Drygores || Theiving guild || more

item.title: ChronicScape 718 Vorago || Squeal || Drygores || Theiving guild || more
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

mogging:

Well that kid was mad because someone who’s now a big help on my server left that guys server and he came to mine to troll me just to talk trash. Do you even know what that’s like? It’s complete horse crap. I totally care about my players and what they think and I take it into consideration but as long as they are having fun and enjoying it’s content over some image bs that only a child would cry about then thas cool but for real it shouldn’t matter about the image stuff who cares stop your crying. So really before you judge what I say maybe learn what it takes to actually be a GOOD owner who cares about their community and tosses trolls aside. I don’t care even if they were to give me a million dollars I will kick trolls off my server no matter what they may bribe me with. And FYI I actually take the time to show each new player around the server so kill that noise.

I’m not quite sure you have a clue what you’re talking about. I can’t however argue that the person that made the original comment was being a bit ridiculous but the people that have made a well spoken suggestion/feedback on the matter, you have thus far become more-and-more ridiculous.

It’s a lot more than a child that would complain about such a thing. The crowns look awful when it comes to a professional looking server and staff team. When I look at them, it looks like I’m walking into a place where the owner has taken no pride in his work. And I can ONLY imagine what the rest is like in terms of how things were done. For example (another one), I log onto a server and see that the NPC is saying, “Welcome back to the server bitches!”.

You have received at least two comments from people who have ran or built PLENTY of servers over the months or years. I fail to see your point in that aspect. And I personally have been apart or owned many servers myself; I’m very well aware of what it takes to run one.

Your ownership will and could be the downfall of this community from what you’ve just shown on this thread, that’s ridiculous.

Read full topic
item.source: ChronicScape 718 Vorago || Squeal || Drygores || Theiving guild || more

It’s complete horse crap. I totally care about my players and what they think and I take it into consideration but as long as they are having fun and enjoying it’s content over some image bs that only a child would cry about then thas cool but for real it shouldn’t matter about the image stuff who cares stop your crying. So really before you judge what I say maybe learn what it takes to actually be a GOOD owner who cares about their community and tosses trolls aside. I don’t care even if they were to give me a million dollars I will kick trolls off my server no matter what they may bribe me with. And FYI I actually take the time to show each new player around the server so kill that noise.

item.title: ChronicScape 718 Vorago || Squeal || Drygores || Theiving guild || more
item.dc:creator: @mogging mogging
item.description:
@mogging wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:14, topic:550030”][quote author=mogging link=topic=668906.msg4474098#msg4474098 date=1424734066]
Crowns are by rights noob.
[/quote]
You don’t say? I thought people would just login and get a crown. I know how private servers work.

[quote author=mogging link=topic=668906.msg4474098#msg4474098 date=1424734066]
And why use new crowns when my players like them? You two are the only people making a huge ordeal out of an image.
Not everything has to go your way alright?[/quote]
We were stating an opinion, get the hell over it. The point I was making is how you responded to the opinions. Like you just did when I posted my opinion. It’s funny.

[quote author=mogging link=topic=668906.msg4474098#msg4474098 date=1424734066]
And I am generally nice just not when some noob wants to say “get rid of your content” basically which to me is rude.
[/quote] Not once did a person say to “get rid of” anything. We simply stated that we did not like your crowns, and believe they should be changed. Not removed.

[quote author=mogging link=topic=668906.msg4474098#msg4474098 date=1424734066]
He could just have said “looks alright but the crowns are not for me.”[/quote]
Uh, someone basically did say that:

And yeah, I agree with Fails; you should change those icons.

And lets just take a look on how you responded:

Since when the fudge should a regular player care about crown images? The fudge you on? Don’t play then baby girl otherwise make your own damn server.

Huh, that doesn’t seem like a very nice reply when all he said was he agreed with an opinion.

[quote author=mogging link=topic=668906.msg4473985#msg4473985 date=1424673202]
But I forgot most of you are still in middle school so it really is no use arguing with someone who’s IQ hasn’t reached above 50 yet. Even a person with down syndrome would understand this.[/quote]
A person in middle school would still have an IQ above 50. A person with downs, however, may not. It really depends per person.
You should look at the IQ Classifications, because you don’t seem to understand how it works. Also, if I had an IQ below 50, I probably wouldn’t be able to use a lot of my motor functions such as: Talking, walking, typing this reply to you, etc.

So please, continue to make yourself look like a terrible owner. I don’t mind it at all.[/quote]

HAHAHAHHA go back to your failscape son get off my thread and do yourself a favor and slit your wrists lmfao. My players know I’m a great owner I just don’t like it when some nooblet complains about something that has nothing to do with them so off my fucking balls faggot.

Read full topic
item.source: ChronicScape 718 Vorago || Squeal || Drygores || Theiving guild || more
